EmailTemplate.name: Contact Update.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Contact Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387>  <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero>  <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell>  <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475>  <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace>
Email Title
We need your help ensuring that we have the best contact information for you so that you don’t miss the next alert.  Please take a moment to review the information we have on file for you and provide any updates by clicking the link below:
First Name: {{lead.First Name:default=Please update}}
Last Name: {{lead.Last Name:default=Please update}}
Company: {{company.Company Name:default=Please update}}
Title: {{lead.Job Title:default=Please update}}
Role: {{lead.Functional Role:default=Please update}}
Address: {{lead.Address:default=Please update}}
City: {{lead.City:default=Please update}}
State/Province/Territory: {{lead.State:default=Please update}}
Postal Code: {{lead.Postal Code:default=Please update}}
Country: {{lead.Country Name:default=Please update}}
Email: {{lead.Email Address:default=Please update}}
Phone: {{lead.Phone Number:default=Please update}}
 



Update/Validate Your Information <http://pages3.honeywell.com/Contact-Update_Contact-Update.html>




Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy>    Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx>
